text: Need Olivia Davis for Red Rooster campaign. Budget around $2,181, looking for 1 x Instagram post, 3 x TikTok video, 3 x Instagram story, 3 x 10-minute unboxing, 2 x Pinterest pin. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
